TopicTitle: Super Dark & Craft spawn IN Launchpad not On...

Articles.Content:
I'm playing with RO, and the associated plugins, couple visual enchancement things that're suggested, etc...

First try, and seems like at 0:00 time it's incredibly dark, it's very very hard to see the lauchpad.

Also it seems that all my craft spawn IN The launch pad, no matter what I do, so they can't thrust anywhere, they refuse to move.

Moreover my kerbals sink into the ground a bit when I get off the craft.

Anyone have any clue what's going wrong here?? ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) I really want to try all this!
